lead_paragraph: Luciano Spalletti has urged AS Roma not to be swept up by the emotion of Sunday's game with Lazio while refusing to disclose whether Francesco Totti will feature in what may be his last derby.

headline.print_headline: Spalletti Puts Emotion Aside as Roma Delay Totti Decision
headline.main: Spalletti Puts Emotion Aside as Roma Delay Totti Decision

snippet: Luciano Spalletti has urged AS Roma not to be swept up by the emotion of Sunday's game with Lazio while refusing to disclose whether Francesco Totti will feature in what may be his last derby....
